experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Baum Family Maker Space, USC | Los Angeles, CA
highlights: Automated RFID door access system using React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB – reduced manual effort by 90% and detected 200+ unauthorized access attempts.
Designed a real-time visualization tool with Python, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Plotly – cut facility wait times by 35% and increased equipment availability by 20%.
Led AUSCAS v2.0, a UML-based data management system with RESTful API integration and Google Apps Script backend – reduced logging errors by 60% and workflow time by 50%.
Revamped financial transaction reports using Python, Pandas, and SQLAlchemy – processed 10,000+ orders annually, enhancing inventory forecasting by 25%.
Developed a Grasshopper plugin in C# (using K4AdotNet) for real-time point cloud and depth image processing.
Engineered an AR sandbox system with the Orbbec SDK in Python – processed depth maps with millimeter-level accuracy for 100+ architecture students.
Optimized 3D printing scheduling with a predictive prioritization system – improved job completion efficiency by 50% across 1,200+ print jobs.
Led a Python data analytics pipeline to visualize student footfall from Orbbec and Kinect sensors – reduced energy costs by 15%.
Offloaded intensive tasks to GPU using OpenGL and Vulkan APIs, significantly reducing CPU load.
Implemented asynchronous I/O and inter-process communication for non-blocking, real-time data updates.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Alien Attorney | Atlanta, GA
highlights: Engineered an AI-driven legal form automation platform using React-Redux, Flask, and MongoDB – reduced form completion time by 40%.
Designed and deployed a vector search-enabled legal document retrieval system with MongoDB Atlas and OpenAI API – cut manual classification efforts by 60%.
Integrated CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Docker – reduced deployment time by 25%.
Implemented a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline using OpenAI API and MongoDB Vector Search – improved document classification accuracy to 85%.
Facilitated synthetic legal document generation with Faker and custom scripts – produced 1,500+ forms and accelerated LLM fine-tuning by 50% using AWS Lambda and TensorFlow.
Developed an LLM-powered restaurant recommendation system leveraging vector embeddings and user clustering – increased recommendation accuracy by 30%.

experience.title: Web Development Intern, Kontaktsource | Remote
highlights: Embedded a real-time LinkedIn feed, enabling dynamic content updates and increasing user engagement by 30%.
Optimized website architecture – reduced page load time by 20% and boosted SEO rankings by 25%.
Developed a membership site using WordPress MemberPress – allowed users to subscribe and access exclusive content.
Enhanced overall site functionality and user experience while leveraging HubSpot for analytics and customer interactions.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Divytech Blockchain LLP | Mumbai, IN
highlights: Led innovative digital coupon distribution for 10 prominent brands – eliminated physical coupon production with anticipated cost savings of 15%.
Improved coupon accessibility and extended validity through collectible NFTs, fostering stronger brand-consumer connections.

experience.title: Software Engineer Intern, Masterbridge
highlights: Led development of an NFT-gated marketing platform using React, Express, Node.js, MongoDB, and Solidity – increased brand engagement by 20% and improved user retention.
Implemented automated testing with Chai and Mocha for smart contracts – reduced bugs by 30% and improved deployment reliability by 15%.
Directed a team of 4 in developing a phisher detection model using Graph Convolutional Networks (GCN) and PyTorch – improved threat detection accuracy by 25% for cryptocurrency networks.
Developed an innovative NFT marketplace enabling designers to monetize unique artworks, integrating ERC-20 tokens for a dynamic digital art community.
